name: Being a Monster
description:
This is a short and simple experience that takes place just before the game, The ER: Patient Typhon, starts. 

- You can buy The ER: Patient Typhon on Steam -

The ER: Patient Typhon is an atmosphere and exploration horror game where you are a young woman who has lost her arms. You have to use your wits, hide and run to survive this tale of deadly monsters and disturbing, environmental puzzles.
